Question
========
During a salmon count, 12 of 48 fish are Chinook salmon. Estimate P(Chinook) using relative frequency.

Solution
========
Relative frequency estimate is count / total = 12 / 48 = 0.25. This is an empirical estimate that would stabilize with larger samples.
